REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f4925 reute b f BC-KAYABA-INDUSTRY-ISSUE 03-17 0054

TEXT.TITLE: KAYABA INDUSTRY ISSUES 50 MLN SWISS FRANC NOTES
TEXT.BODY: Kayaba Industry Co Ltd is privately placing 50 mln Swiss francs of five year straight notes with a 4-3/4 pct coupon and 100.25 issue price, lead manager Credit Suisse said. Payment is due March 31. The issue is guaranteed by Fuji Bank Ltd. REUTER
